docs.text:
Welcome to Arduino


Here you will learn how to use Arduino


FAQs






Where do I run the code?




Option 1: 
Installing Arduino
  (Windows, Mac, and Linux) 


Option 2: 
Code Online with Arduino Web Editor
 (Requires Account Creation) 








What if I need help?
 




We're only 
an email
 away :D


Optionally, you can attend our weekly coding club meetings at the Rancho Penasquitos Library






What if I'm not a part of SD Code?
 


Don't worry about it! This resource is free to use by anyone!






Can I host this on my website?


Sure, as long as you give credit and link it to our website






How can I contribute?


Submit a pull request to the repository on 
Github








Creators




Nicholas Nebel
